content.html: I made a little app: it sits in your notification area and strips all that utm_stuff=blah&utm_banner=ohno tracking link stuff off of links on your clipboard, so when you paste the link to your mates to share it, all that stuff is gone. Simple but useful! kryogenix.org/code/utm_no/
content.value:
I made a little app: it sits in your notification area and strips all that utm_stuff=blah&utm_banner=ohno tracking link stuff off of links on your clipboard, so when you paste the link to your mates to share it, all that stuff  is gone. Simple but useful!
kryogenix.org/code/utm_no/

photo.alt: utm_no. Remove tracking parameters from copied URLs. For Ubuntu and other Linux OSes. kryogenix.org/code/utm_no
